au.edu.federation.caliko

Class FabrikStructure3D

  • java.lang.Object
    • au.edu.federation.caliko.FabrikStructure3D

  • public class FabrikStructure3D
extends Object
    A FabrikStructure3D contains one or more FabrikChain3D objects, which we can solve using the FABRIK (Forward And Backward Reaching Inverse Kinematics) algorithm for specified target locations.

    The FabrikStructure3D class is merely a convenient holder for a list of FabrikChain3D objects which allows multiple chains to have their target location updated, as well as solving and drawing the multiple chains attached to the FabrikStructure3D object using one method call per structure.

    If you do not intend on attaching multiple FabrikChain3D objects into a complex structure, for example one with multiple effectors, then you may be better served by creating individual FabrikChain3D objects and using those objects directly.

    Version:
    0.4 - 29/12/2015
    Author:
    Al Lansley

    • Method Detail

      • updateTarget

        public void updateTarget(Vec3f newTargetLocation)
        Update the target location for this FabrikStructure3D, and hence the target of all chains attached to this structure.

        The result of running this method is that each FabrikChain3D has its updateTarget method called, which in turn calls the chain's solveIK method to attempt to solve the IK chain for the new target location.

        Parameters:
        newTargetLocation - The location of the target for which we will attempt to solve all chains attached to this structure.

      • updateTarget

        public void updateTarget(float targetX,
                         float targetY,
                         float targetZ)
        Method to update the target location for a FabrikStructure3D, and hence all the target of all chains attached to this structure.

        After this method has been executed, the state of all IK chains attached to this structure will have been updated.

        Internally, this method simply constructs a Vec3f from the provided x/y/z values and calls the Vec3f version of this method.

        Parameters:
        targetX - The target x location.
        targetY - The target y location.
        targetZ - The target z location.

      • addChain

        public void addChain(FabrikChain3D chain)
        Add a FabrikChain3D to this FabrikStructure3D.

        In effect, the chain is added to the mChains list of FabrikChain3D objects, and the mNumChains property is incremented.

        Adding a chain using this method adds the chain to the structure, but does not connect it to any existing chain in the structure. If you wish to connect a chain, use one of the connectChain methods instead.

        All chains in a structure share the same target, and all chains in the structure can be solved for the target location via a single call to updateTarget.

        Parameters:
        chain - (FabrikChain3D) The FabrikChain3D to add to this structure.
        See Also:
        connectChain(au.edu.federation.caliko.FabrikChain3D, int, int), connectChain(au.edu.federation.caliko.FabrikChain3D, int, int, au.edu.federation.caliko.FabrikBone3D.BoneConnectionPoint3D)

      • removeChain

        public void removeChain(int chainIndex)
        Remove a FabrikChain3D from this FabrikStructure3D by its index.

        In effect, the chain is removed from the mChains list of FabrikChain3D objects, and the mNumChains property is decremented.

        Parameters:
        chainIndex - The index of the chain to remove from the mChains list of FabrikChain3D objects.

      • connectChain

        public void connectChain(FabrikChain3D newChain,
                         int existingChainNumber,
                         int existingBoneNumber)
        Connect a chain to an existing chain in this structure.

        Both chains and bones are are zero indexed.

        If the existingChainNumber or existingBoneNumber specified to connect to does not exist in this structure then an IllegalArgumentExeception is thrown.

        Parameters:
        newChain - The chain to connect to this structure
        existingChainNumber - The index of the chain to connect the new chain to.
        existingBoneNumber - The index of the bone to connect the new chain to within the existing chain.

      • connectChain

        public void connectChain(FabrikChain3D newChain,
                         int existingChainNumber,
                         int existingBoneNumber,
                         FabrikBone3D.BoneConnectionPoint3D boneConnectionPoint)
        Connect a chain to an existing chain in this structure.

        Both chains and bones are are zero indexed.

        If the existingChainNumber or existingBoneNumber specified to connect to does not exist in this structure then an IllegalArgumentExeception is thrown.

        Parameters:
        newChain - The chain to connect to this structure
        existingChainNumber - The index of the chain to connect the new chain to.
        existingBoneNumber - The index of the bone to connect the new chain to within the existing chain.
        boneConnectionPoint - Whether the new chain should connect to the START or END of the specified bone in the specified chain.

      • getNumChains

        public int getNumChains()
        Return the number of chains in this structure.
        Returns:
        The number of chains in this structure.

      • getChain

        public FabrikChain3D getChain(int chainNumber)
        Return the specified chain from this structure.

        Chain numbers are zero indexed. If the specified chain does not exist in this structure then an IllegalArgumentException is thrown.

        Parameters:
        chainNumber - The specified chain from this structure.
        Returns:
        The specified FabrikChain3D from this chain.

      • setFixedBaseMode

        public void setFixedBaseMode(boolean fixedBaseMode)
        Set the fixed base mode on all chains in this structure.
        Parameters:
        fixedBaseMode - Whether all chains should operate in fixed base mode (true) or not (false).

      • toString

        public String toString()
        Return a concise, human readable description of this FabrikStructure3D.

        If further details on a specific chain are required, then you should get and print each chain individually.

        Overrides:

        Returns:
        A concise, human readable description of this FabrikStructure3D.
